effect.x_y: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

short_effect.x_y: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.

flavor_text.x_y: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.
